short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: See a graphical summary of the space used on your computer. Works offline, too!

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Space Waster Terminator allows you to easily see which folders and files are taking up space on your computer. Simply select the folder that you want to scan (e.g. your music folder), that's it! 

The app works online and offline, and will scan local or network drives.

Scanning runs at about 2,000 files/second; keep this in mind when scanning large directories as there is no progress indicator.
